channel.title: Adding hidden admin
channel.description:
deob: 612 base:hybridpvp (ithink)
player rights: 1=mod 2=admin 3=owner 4=donator i have tried all numbers up to 10. what i need to know is how to add the ints to make another player rights, ive heard its easy. anyone help?

item.title: Adding hidden admin
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

there is no real “user group rank” All it is a person who has a certain set number in a file that gets a special crown and a list of commands. Going by what I just told you could make hidden admin any number if you added it into your commands.

So

[code]if (c.playerRights = 95) (

-command here
-command here
-command here
etc[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Adding hidden admin
item.dc:creator: @Explisionist Explisionist
item.description:
@Explisionist wrote:

On your commands make it where its greater or equal to 3… Or make certain commands to 5, etc… And never make a donator higher than the staff… Because they can do commands unless its only equal to 4…

Read full topic
